issue.title: [C++][Compute] Standardize generator dispatchers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14134](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14134). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
codegen_internal.h formally defines generator dispatchers and there are a few GDs defined in kernel source files. GDs should be categorized, commented, and renamed appropriately.

Also, the documentation for GD should be updated since more capable GDs have been added.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14134?focusedCommentId=17429024) by Eduardo Ponce (edponce):*
[Here is the initial conversation](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11233#discussion_r717247336) on renaming GD for Binary/StringTypes.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14134?focusedCommentId=17500322) by Pradeep Garigipati (pradeepgarigipati):*
After brain storming (with `[~edponce]`) for a bit on generator dispatchers in [codegen_internal.h](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compute/kernels/codegen_internal.h#L988) source file, we have created a [google document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xIwOGSsQiykGvmX1bK3iRWDbJagGeAC0-4rH1xgVMBI/edit?usp=sharing) outlining a proposal to refactor the names of generator dispatchers to follow a systematic pattern. 

We are sharing the document here to take the discussion further with community feedback.

Thank you.

`[~lidavidm]`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14134?focusedCommentId=17500324) by David Li (lidavidm):*
`[~pradeepgarigipati]` `[~edponce]` thanks! I'll try to take a look when I get a chance. Do you mind opening the doc for comments?

`[~apitrou]` and `[~rokm]` may also be interested.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14134?focusedCommentId=17500328) by Pradeep Garigipati (pradeepgarigipati):*
Permissions are fixed now, please refresh

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14134?focusedCommentId=17500351) by Rok Mihevc (rokm):*
I wouldn't mind namespace being more uniform.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14134?focusedCommentId=17567285) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This issue has been inactive for 3 months, so it has been unassigned and marked as unstarted. If you are still working on this, feel free to reassign yourself and resume progress.
